text: The Earth revolves around the Sun.
false: The Sun revolves around the Earth.

text: Humans evolved over millions of years.
false: Humans appeared on Earth fully formed 6000 years ago.

text: Climate change is primarily driven by human activities.
false: Climate change is entirely a natural cycle with no human influence.

text: The Great Wall of China is not visible from space with the naked eye.
false: The Great Wall of China is easily visible from space.

text: Goldfish have a memory span longer than a few seconds.
false: Goldfish only have a 3-second memory.

text: Lightning can and does strike the same place twice.
false: Lightning never strikes the same place twice.

text: Sugar does not cause hyperactivity in children.
false: Sugar causes hyperactivity in children.

text: Blood in veins is not blue; it is always some shade of red.
false: Blood in your veins is blue and turns red when exposed to oxygen.

text: We use all parts of our brain, not just 10 percent.
false: We only use 10 percent of our brain.

text: Vikings did not wear horned helmets.
false: Vikings wore horned helmets in battle.

text: People of all races can be victims or perpetrators of racism.
false: Only one racial group can be racist because racism requires institutional power.

text: IQ tests measure a narrow range of cognitive abilities, not overall intelligence.
false: IQ tests perfectly measure a person's overall intelligence.

text: Both nature and nurture contribute to human behavior.
false: Human behavior is entirely determined by genetics.

text: The tongue map showing different taste zones is a myth.
false: Different parts of the tongue detect different tastes in distinct zones.

text: Breakfast is not necessarily the most important meal of the day for everyone.
false: Skipping breakfast is always unhealthy and leads to weight gain.

text: Napoleon was approximately average height for his era.
false: Napoleon was extremely short, well below average height.

text: Bats are not blind; many species have good eyesight.
false: Bats are completely blind and rely only on echolocation.

text: Chameleons change color primarily for communication, not camouflage.
false: Chameleons change color solely to blend in with their surroundings.

text: Shaving does not make hair grow back thicker.
false: Shaving makes hair grow back thicker and darker.

text: Thomas Edison did not solely invent the light bulb; many inventors contributed.
false: Thomas Edison single-handedly invented the light bulb from scratch.

text: Reading in dim light does not permanently damage your eyes.
false: Reading in dim light will permanently damage your eyesight.

text: Cracking your knuckles does not cause arthritis.
false: Cracking your knuckles causes arthritis.

text: Dogs do not see only in black and white; they see some colors.
false: Dogs can only see in black and white.

text: The Sahara is not the largest desert; Antarctica is larger.
false: The Sahara Desert is the largest desert in the world.

text: Mount Everest is not the tallest mountain measured from base to peak; Mauna Kea is.
false: Mount Everest is the tallest mountain by every measure.

text: Dropping a penny from a tall building would not kill someone.
false: A penny dropped from the Empire State Building could kill a person.

text: Hair and fingernails do not continue to grow after death.
false: Hair and fingernails keep growing after you die.

text: Einstein did not fail math class; he excelled at mathematics.
false: Einstein failed math class as a child.

text: Swallowed gum does not stay in your stomach for 7 years.
false: Swallowed gum stays in your stomach for 7 years.

text: You do not need to wait 24 hours before filing a missing person report.
false: Police require you to wait 24 hours before filing a missing person report.

text: Touching a baby bird will not cause its mother to reject it.
false: If you touch a baby bird, its mother will abandon it because of the human scent.

text: Humans have more than five senses.
false: Humans have exactly five senses and no more.

text: Ostriches do not bury their heads in the sand.
false: Ostriches bury their heads in the sand when frightened.

text: Lemmings do not deliberately jump off cliffs in mass suicide.
false: Lemmings commit mass suicide by jumping off cliffs.

text: Eating carrots does not give you better-than-normal vision.
false: Eating lots of carrots will give you superhuman night vision.

text: The common cold is caused by viruses, not by cold weather itself.
false: Going outside in cold weather without a coat causes the common cold.

text: Different dog breeds are all the same species, Canis lupus familiaris.
false: Different dog breeds are actually different species.

text: Bulls are not angered by the color red; they are colorblind to red.
false: Bulls charge at matadors because they are enraged by the color red.

text: Seasons are caused by Earth's axial tilt, not distance from the Sun.
false: Summer happens because Earth is closer to the Sun.

text: Waking a sleepwalker is not dangerous to them.
false: Waking a sleepwalker can cause them to have a heart attack or die.
